quotePub
Class QuotePublisherA

java.lang.Object
  quotePub.QuotePublisherA
All Implemented Interfaces:
javax.jms.MessageListener
public class QuotePublisherA
extends java.lang.Object
implements javax.jms.MessageListener

General quote publisher

Initialize stock market DAX from DAX.in file and instantiate companies to Company objects

Refresh every company stock quote over time independently, range from 5 to 15 seconds

Publish quote to JMS

User can use command add/delete to create/remove a stock

initializeJMS

private static void initializeJMS()
                           throws java.lang.Exception

1. Create a new ActiveMQConnectionFactory from url, which is set to ActiveMQConnection.DEFAULT_BROKER_URL

2. Use the ConnectionFactory to create a new TopicConnection and a new QueueConnection

3. Use Connections to create TopicSession for publishing and QueueSession for initialization

Throws:
java.lang.Exception
